alert.note: Alert for Western Kenai Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 11:44AM AKST until January 30 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Visibility reduced to one half mile or less at times. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches, highest amounts in Homer. Southwest to west winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Ninilchik south to Kachemak Bay, including Homer and Seldovia. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be hazardous. Blowing snow will significant reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will slowly diminish this afternoon, leading to improving visibility. Snow showers will linger into the evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
